SELECT ('IDPROG=' || r.IDPROG||',IDROM='||r.IDROM ||',IDRUTA='|| r.IDRUTA) As ID, CASE WHEN ri.TITLE IS NULL OR TRIM(ri.TITLE) = '' THEN r.NOMBRE ELSE ri.TITLE END AS NOMBRES FROM ROMS r LEFT JOIN ROMINFO ri ON r.IDPROG = ri.IDPROG and r.IDROM = ri.IDROM
QUERY.WHERECLAUSE: WHERE IDPROG=? ORDER BY NOMBRES ASC
